author: Giulia Guccurullo
description: Black tea contributes an almost smoky note to this long tequila-laced cocktail.
name: Tea-Quila
recipeIngredient: 50 ml Brewed cold black breakfast tea
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: POUR first 3 ingredients into glass and stir to combine
Fill glass with ice and TOP with lemonade
